kizuna_friend_a_01:
[BD06:0]Yo, [trnm:0]! You grabbing
something\r
to\r
eat,\r
too?[npcn:6]
kizuna_friend_a_02:
Man, you sure did give me a beating in that
Academy Ace Tournament![npcn:6]
kizuna_friend_a_03:
Seems like all my closest buddies are in another
league, you know?[npcn:6]
kizuna_friend_a_04:
I mean, look at you—you just up and became
a Champion! In your first year, to boot!\c
You know that’s pretty amazing, right?[npcn:6]
kizuna_friend_a_05:
Then there’s Nemona—top marks in every class
at school, and she’s Champion-ranked too.[npcn:6]
kizuna_friend_a_06:
And I hear Penny’s got some kind of offer to
work for the Pokémon League or something?![npcn:6]
kizuna_friend_a_07:
I seem to be the only average one around here.
Nothing special about me...[npcn:6]
kizuna_friend_a_08a:
Nah, I mean...it’s just, like, a hobby really.\c
I only learned how to do the basics because my
[mom;dad:gs] wasn’t around to cook for me...[npcn:6]
kizuna_friend_a_08b:
Tch! You sure don’t give a guy a break, huh?\c
So, the only special thing about me is who my
[mom;dad:gs] was? Not like I had anything to do with it...[npcn:6]
kizuna_friend_a_10:
See, now that Mabosstiff is doing so much better,
and since the Treasure Hunt is still going and all,\r
I’ve been thinking of a new goal: to find myself![npcn:6]
kizuna_friend_a_11:
And I guess you’ve really gotta start by knowing
where you come from, which means...I should\r
learn more about my [mom;dad:gs], right?[npcn:6]
kizuna_friend_a_12a:
She was a student at this school once, too. That’s
what I heard.[npcn:6]
kizuna_friend_a_12b:
He was a student at this school once, too. That’s
what I heard.[npcn:6]
kizuna_friend_a_13a:
I’m gonna search the whole school for info about
what kind of person she really was![npcn:6]
kizuna_friend_a_13b:
I’m gonna search the whole school for info about
what kind of person he really was![npcn:6]
kizuna_friend_a_14: Thanks for the inspiration, little buddy![npcn:6]
